ticket.title: xtask Stage X1: optional internal receipts/events (still non-authoritative)

tickets.reason: Stage X0 banner and non-authoritative labeling must land first.
Session endpoints must exist to emit internal receipts/events.
CAS durability required for internal artifact emission.
ChangeSetBundle/ChangeSetPublished required for internal FAC receipts.
ReviewReceiptRecorded required for internal review receipts.

in_scope: Add optional flags for xtask to emit internal receipts/events.
Keep xtask non-authoritative and non-blocking on daemon availability.

steps: Add optional --emit-internal flag to xtask review/aat/security tasks.
Ensure daemon unavailability does not block xtask runs.
Document optional internal emission as non-authoritative.

criteria: xtask can optionally emit internal receipts/events without blocking.
GitHub status writes remain unchanged in Stage X1.

notes.security:
Internal receipt emission must not elevate xtask authority; it is additive
scaffolding only.
notes.general: Stage X1 is optional and must not block or change existing dev workflows.
